attributes.action: We want Government to reinstate the free school meals for our children
attributes.additional_details: You only have to look at the way poverty is now with the amount of homelessness people on the streets and people not being able to provide food or shelter for there own needs , this government needs to be asking it's self serious questions if they are to continue to get the publics vote on there own futures if this way of life is going to continue beyond the current government existence.
attributes.background: Children will suffer as a result of this happening , there grades at school could also suffer . And in some cases children could be taken away from there familys through malnutrition because of the cuts to either there benefit or workin wages
